  • Uses of DockerRun in org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.docker

    Methods in org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.docker that return DockerRun
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.currentUser()
    Sets user to current user/group.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.name(String name)
    Used to set the containers name.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.parameter(String key, Object value)
    Adds an environmental parameter to the docker run command.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.portBinding(int portHost, int portContainer)
    Adds an explicit port binding to this docker run command.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.removeAfterRun()
    Marks the docker container to be removed after it has been run.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.removeBeforeRun()
    If containers with the same name are already running, this method marks those containers to be removed beforehand.
    DockerRun
    DockerClient.run(String image)
    Compose a docker run command by calling this method, building your command, and eventually calling execute().
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.user(String user)
    Sets the user and group of container.
    DockerRun
    DockerRun.volumeBinding(File localDir, String volumePath)
    Adds an explicit volume binding this docker run command.
